22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include "Configuration.h"
24 #include "TestMacros.h"
25 #include <catch.hpp>
26 #include <Eigen/Dense>
27 
28 using namespace Mutation;
29 using namespace Catch;
30 using namespace Eigen;
31 
32 TEST_CASE("Species production rates sum to zero", "[kinetics]")
33 {
34  const double tol = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon()*1000;
35 
36  MIXTURE_LOOP
37  (
38  VectorXd rhoi(mix.nSpecies());
39  VectorXd tmps(mix.nEnergyEqns());
40  VectorXd wdot(mix.nSpecies());
41 
42  rhoi.setConstant(0.1);
43 
44  SECTION("Thermal equilibrium") {
45  for (int i = 0; i < 20; ++i) {
46  tmps.setConstant(500.0*i + 500.0);
47  mix.setState(rhoi.data(), tmps.data(), 1);
48  mix.netProductionRates(wdot.data());
49  CHECK(wdot.sum()/wdot.lpNorm<Infinity>() == Approx(0.0).margin(tol));
50  }
51  }
52 
53  SECTION("Thermal nonequilibrium") {
54  for (int i = 0; i < 20; ++i) {
55  for (int k = 0; k < mix.nEnergyEqns(); ++k)
56  tmps[k] = 500.0*i + 500.0 + 50.0*k*std::pow(-1.0,(double) k);
57  mix.setState(rhoi.data(), tmps.data(), 1);
58  mix.netProductionRates(wdot.data());
59  CHECK(wdot.sum()/wdot.lpNorm<Infinity>() == Approx(0.0).margin(tol));
60  }
61  }
62  )
63 }
64 
65 
66 TEST_CASE("Species production rates are zero in equilibrium", "[kinetics]")
67 {
68  const double tol = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon()*1000;
69 
70  MIXTURE_LOOP
71  (
72  VectorXd wdot(mix.nSpecies());
73 
74  EQUILIBRATE_LOOP
75  (
76  mix.netProductionRates(wdot.data());
77  for (int i = 0; i < mix.nSpecies(); ++i)
78  CHECK(wdot[i] == Approx(0.0).margin(tol));
79  )
80  )
81 }
